subject.topic: Festival of Texas Composers (1988 : Ft. Worth, Tex.)

mods.note: Homage for Chamber Orchestra was commissioned through a competition held by the Manuscript Archives Committee and the Texas Federation of Music Clubs in memory of Caroline Bock. The premiere performance took place at Southern Methodist University hosting the Festival of Texas Composers by the SMU Perspectives Ensemble, John Russo conducting. Instrumentation is flutes, oboe, clarinet in B-flat, harp, violins, violas, celli, bass.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
Physical rights and copyright are retained by the LSU Libraries. Permission to reproduce or publish must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: William J. Thornton Papers, Mss. 2012, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
